title: Orthodoxy Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to roleblock a random non-Hallow player who would visit a player of your choice. If they would have killed your target, you gain a Faith point.
- Use 2 bees to learn the role of a player and the names and roles of all other players who visit that player. If you learn at least three roles this way, you gain 2 Faith points.
- Use 3 bees to choose three players and redirect all players who would visit the first to the second, the second to the third, and the third to the first. If you redirect at least five players this way, you gain 3 Faith points.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
- When you have accumulated 3 Faith points, the Saint will gain a Saint point.
- Once the Saint has become the Paragon, you will lose a bee.
